sections.title: Device testing
sections.subHeading: Make sure to test your site properly
sections.intro: It is important to test your site on different devices.
sections.callToAction: Use your own phones and the following tools to make sure your site is ready for the real world
tasks: Follow the guide on simulating devices in chrome to quickly test on different devices while developing your site
Use your own phones and devices to test your hosted site
Use some of the online resources to simulate additional devices

sections.title: Continuous learning

extraResources.title: Which podcasts should web designers and developers be listening to?

sections.intro: Web design and development is a rapidly changing industry. This is exciting but it means anyone who wants to do well must keep learning
sections.callToAction: Get engaged and build on what you've learned
tasks: Have a read of the front end dev handbook. There are great resources for everyone from beginners to experienced professionals.
Sign up to some blogs or RSS feeds to keep up to date with the industry
Listen to some podcasts to learn from industry leaders
